name: Time Squared (itch)
description:
Your only objective is to reach the end of the level.

Every level has a timer that will forcefully rewind you back to a marker that you can change as you progress. 

Dominantly a speed platformer, but also a little rage, cause who doesn't love rage?

CONTROLS

A and D to move

Space to jump and double jump

Shift to dash (must be holding A or D)

Space to wall jump (must be holding the opposite direction of the wall and well... on a wall)

R to restart the level (if your character gets glitched, but hopefully that shouldn't happen)
